com.aikinparker.events

Interface EventDispatcher

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultEventDispatcher, NotificationCenter

    public interface EventDispatcher

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addEventListener(Event.Listener listener, Event event)
      Register an instance of Event.Listener as a subscriber of the specified Event.
      void dispatchEvent(Event event)
      Dispatch an event to each Listener instance listening for the specified event.
      void removeEventListener(Event.Listener listener, java.lang.String eventType)
      Unregister the specified listener for this particular event.

    • Method Detail

      • addEventListener

        void addEventListener(Event.Listener listener,
                    Event event)
        Register an instance of Event.Listener as a subscriber of the specified Event.
        Parameters:
        listener - The Event.Listener instance subscribing for the specified Event.
        event - The Event to which the listener should subscribe.

      • removeEventListener

        void removeEventListener(Event.Listener listener,
                       java.lang.String eventType)
        Unregister the specified listener for this particular event.
        Parameters:
        listener - An implementation of Event.Listener.
        eventType - A string with which to identify a specific type of event.

      • dispatchEvent

        void dispatchEvent(Event event)
        Dispatch an event to each Listener instance listening for the specified event.
        Parameters:
        event - The event to dispatch.
